document.description: Welcome to Bangkok Thai Cuisine, a finest Thai Cuisine in Fremont. View the Menu and Order Online your favorite Thai Food for Take-out/Pick-up and Delivery.

Home About Us Menu Reviews Order Online Location
3213 Walnut Ave Fremont CA 94538
Welcome to Bangkok Thai Cuisine, a finest Thai Cuisine in Fremont. View the Menu and Order Online your favorite Thai Food for Take-out/Pick-up and Delivery. We serve all over Fremont.
Delicious food served fresh off the Grill!
Address 3213 Walnut Ave Fremont CA 94538 Restaurant Hours Weekdays: 11:00 am - 10:00 pm
Weekends: 12:00 pm - 10:00 pm Catering Hours All Week 10:00 am - 09:00 pm ©2009 Bangkok Thai Cuisine by Bay Web Soft
